Events, Workshops and Classes

This page contains a list of all the events, workshops and classes I have attended in the past years, both as a participant and as a speaker. For those in which I have actively presented something, a link to my slides is included whenever available.
This page does not include entire courses, for which a separate list is provided in my CV page.

Events Attended

2019

  • Chips & Salsa, Digital, Interactive and Mediterranean Journalisms by Formica Blu + Effecinque · Genova (Italy) · 14 June 2019
  • Data Journalism UK by Paul Bradshaw and Birmingham City University · MediaCityUK Manchester (UK) · 02 May 2019
  • Open Days dell'Innovazione by Innovazione allo Sviluppo · Turin (Italy) · 06 March 2019

2018

  • Luoghi comuni. Geografie della città tra estetica, politica e studi urbani by Università La Sapienza · Rome, Italy · 14 June 2018
  • Infografica e Infoestetica by ISIA Firenze · Florence, Italy · 11 - 12 May 2018

2016

  • Winter University: Using European data for better storytelling by European People's Party · Brussels, Belgium · November 22 - 23, 2016
  • Contentious Data: A One-day event on the Politics of Big Data for Activism by DATACTIVE · Amsterdam, The Netherlands · September 15, 2016
  • Shift, Shape, Mobilize Workshop by Sourcefabric and n-ost · Odessa, Ukraine · July 31 - August 7, 2016
  • Summer School for Journalists and Media Practicioners by European University Institute · Fiesole, Italy · July 11-15, 2016
  • EU Transparency Camp by Open State Foundation · Amsterdam, The Netherlands · June 1, 2016

2015

  • Data4Change by SmallMedia and VisualizingImpact · Beirut, Lebanon · November 28 - December 2, 2015
  • NewsImpact Amsterdam by European Journalism Center · Amsterdam, The Netherlands · October 30, 2015
  • Nordic Data Journalism Conference by NODA · Ålesund, Norway · January 30-31, 2015

2014

  • Hacks/Hackers Amsterdam by H/H Amsterdam · Amsterdam, The Netherlands · different events throughout the year 2014 - 2015
  • Young European Journalist Workshop 'Data and Journalism: Between big stories and dirty surveillance' by M100 Sanssouci Colloquium · Potsdam, Germany · September 8 - 13, 2014
  • Transparency Summit by GNI and Center for Democracy and Technology · Berlin, Germany · June 11, 2014
  • London Data Dive by DataKind · London, United Kingdom · June 6 - 8, 2014
  • Rethinking Journalism: The Societal Role & Relevance of Journalism in a Digital Age by University of Groningen · Groningen, The Netherlands · January 23 - 24, 2014

2013

  • Data Journalism Workshop 'Turning Data into Stories' by MediaLab Prado · Madrid, Spain · October 25 - 27, 2013 + December 13 - 15, 2013
  • International Journalism Festival by IJF · Perugia, Italy · April 24 - 28, 2013
  • School of Data Journalism by School of Data · Perugia, Italy · April 24 - 27, 2013
